subject: al  Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: The Ghost Box, is training required?
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
The first step should be to see if there are any sponsors 
interested.  That would take care of many of the $$$ issues.  I know 
there are some on this forum who have been involved in these type 
meetings.  I wonder if any of them would be willing to consider 
taking on this effort.

Don't ask Radio Shack though... Their lawyers have already contacted 
me with one of those legal threats.

- Mike
